thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com | 3 of 104
thread.title: Michael Schwartz

author: Michael Schwartz
title: Michael Schwartz
text: I had an issue with the airport pickup zone that they didn't resolve and actually ignored my concern so I thought that was pretty scummy of them. I lost money and time. I also don't like how long I have to wait for passengers sometimes. Maybe they just don't have enough customers but it seems more like there is some kind of queue and if you're out of the zone you have to wait longer. Otherwise, it's okay.
